site.title: WHPH - Work Hard Play Hard | Master Your Productivity
site.description: Transform your productivity with intelligent task management, habit tracking, and time optimization. Free, open-source, and cross-platform productivity app for Android, Windows, and Linux.
site.keywords: productivity app, task management, habit tracker, time tracking, open source productivity, cross platform, privacy focused, free productivity tools

hero.title: Work Hard, Play Hard
hero.subtitle: The comprehensive productivity app that helps you manage tasks, build habits, and optimize your time across all your devices.

features.title: Everything You Need for Productivity
features.subtitle: WHPH combines powerful task management, habit tracking, and time analytics in one comprehensive, privacy-focused application.

taskManagement.title: Smart Task Management
taskManagement.description: Organize, prioritize, and track your tasks with intelligent scheduling and progress visualization.

habitTracking.title: Habit Development
habitTracking.description: Build lasting habits with progress tracking, streak visualization, and motivational insights.

timeAnalytics.title: Time Insights
timeAnalytics.description: Understand your productivity patterns with detailed app usage analytics and time distribution.

crossPlatform.title: Everywhere You Work
crossPlatform.description: Seamless experience across Android, Windows, and Linux with optional data synchronization.

screenshots.title: See WHPH in Action
screenshots.subtitle: Explore the intuitive interface and powerful features that make WHPH the ultimate productivity companion.

download.title: Get Started Today
download.subtitle: Download WHPH for free and start transforming your productivity. Available on all major platforms with no account required.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about WHPH's features, privacy, and community.

free.question: Is WHPH really free?
free.answer: Yes, WHPH is completely free and open source. There are no premium tiers, subscription fees, or hidden costs. You get access to all features without any limitations. The app is funded by community contributions and developed by volunteers who believe productivity tools should be accessible to everyone.

platforms.question: What platforms are supported?
platforms.answer: WHPH is available on Android, Windows, and Linux. You can download it from our GitHub releases, F-Droid (for Android), or compile from source. We're working on iOS and macOS support, but they're not available yet due to development resource constraints.

privacy.question: How is my data protected?
privacy.answer: Your privacy is our top priority. WHPH stores all data locally on your device by default. We don't collect, track, or store any personal information on external servers. Optional cloud sync is available through your own cloud storage providers (like Google Drive or Dropbox) if you choose to enable it, giving you full control over your data.

contribute.question: How can I get help or contribute?
contribute.answer: Join our GitHub Discussions for community support, feature requests, and general questions. If you're a developer, you can contribute code, report bugs, or help with translations on our GitHub repository. We also welcome designers, documentation writers, and anyone interested in improving productivity tools.

sync.question: How do I sync data between devices?
sync.answer: WHPH offers optional data synchronization between your desktop and mobile devices over your local network. You can sync your tasks, habits, and progress data directly between devices without any cloud services. All synchronization happens locally, ensuring your productivity data remains completely private and never leaves your network.

offline.question: Does WHPH work offline?
offline.answer: Absolutely! WHPH is designed to work completely offline. All your tasks, habits, and analytics are stored locally on your device. You can use every feature without an internet connection. Local network sync is only used when you explicitly enable it and only works with devices on the same network.

backup.question: Can I backup and restore my data?
backup.answer: Yes, WHPH provides comprehensive backup and restore support. You can easily backup all your tasks, habits, and progress data, and restore them when needed. Additionally, you can export your data in CSV and JSON formats as needed. This way you can keep your data safe and use it with other tools.

workHardPlayHard.question: What does the "Work Hard Play Hard" motto mean?
workHardPlayHard.answer: "Work Hard Play Hard" is a motto that encourages individuals to balance high responsibility with high life satisfaction. So take your work seriously, but also truly rest, have fun, and live during your free time. Work isn't just about making money, but about growing and finding fulfillment; having fun isn't laziness, but the natural reward of effort. As WHPH, we also value both productive work and consciously celebrating successes. Now that you know what this motto means, you can listen to [David Guetta](https://youtu.be/5dbEhBKGOtY) or [Wiz Khalifa](https://youtu.be/TWHNr0BrNgo)'s songs on this topic.

donate.title: Support WHPH Development
donate.description: Help us continue developing this free and open-source productivity app that respects your privacy and puts you in control of your data.
donate.supportMessage: Your support enables us to keep WHPH free for everyone while continuously improving its features and maintaining its high standards.

about.title: Open Source & Privacy-First
about.description: WHPH is completely open source and designed with privacy in mind. Your data stays on your device unless you choose to sync it. Join our community on GitHub Discussions for support, feature requests, and contributions.
